name: Leap Motion Games
description:
[Requires Windows and Leap Motion Controller]

Three games made in Unity3D utilizing Leap Motion Orion technology by two high school seniors for their independent study project. 

Soccer: Two-player game where each person uses one hand to prevent the other person from scoring on their side.

Duck Hunt: Use your right hand to aim the gun and your left hand to press the button that shoots. Shoot ducks to get points and avoid shooting roosters. Get as many points as possible in thirty seconds.

Gem Catch: Use your hand to move the mine cart left to right to catch as many gems as possible. Avoid the stalactites.
